data.title: India Bans Captive Dolphin Shows as ‘Morally Unacceptable’ - Says they're highly intelligent & should be seen as ‘non-human persons’ with their own specific rights.

A successful student in India on track to become a PhD ignored harassment from 3 male students. So they waited until she was asleep and crippled her with acid. And after only 24 months in jail the attackers were set free.
